column4: yeah, you sure its got enough room to do the unzipping it needs
What's a good FTP/firmware upgrade client for a Topfield TF5000PVRt that runs on GNU/Linux?
fairly specific question. i like lftp as an ftp client, not sure if it does what you need
yeh. its  command line driven app. otherwise gftp is available for use or nautilus supports ftp
